It finally happened. Ntr got someone so delusional  he thinks that his fantasy  has really happened.

This actually happened in my lifetime. A friend of my getting bully by some college boys and when my friend saw him and his mother walking together at the market. Then my friend stalked them to their house, I was there as well. Then he went to somewhere with his friend. Me and my friend knock the door of his house. She was hot and sexy, and the plan was exactly going the way like i saw in the hentai. She told us to called her Linda. My friend told her that her son is bullying him and wanted told him to stopped bully him and Linda asked what can she do to repay us. I was thinking how dumb she was to ask us these questions. My friend just straight on and grabbed her boobs and said this is what you can do to repay us. We later have 3P until he is back. It was about two and a half hours, we ran off behind the garden fences. We still going there every weekend or he not home. You might think this is not real and I talking bullshit but i am not, I just want to proof that some story is real.

I'd love to see the day when an actual adult that's interested in her comes along, catches them, and like @lalala5 says, responds with anger and immediately knocks the kid off her restrains him or maybe the hit knocks his ass out, then he has to watch the dude, with a grown man's dick, plow the fuck out her (Netori for the win). Plus it'd be a truly perfect ending if the bitches son had been the grown dudes, teacher, counselor, or an acquaintance of some sorts that he got along with and basically led him along to falling for his mom and eventually got him to see her fucking the kid so that he'll do what he does, and take the bitch for himself, while still getting along with her son (proper vengeance with the wingman essence).

I remember how this shock me back then some years ago, when Pururin was online, still very good. 

The comment below is right.

Even if this doujinshi is just fiction, it means something that thecharacter have some belieable reactions otherwise it is a joke not a sad story. The problem with this netorare (and many of them) is not that your main character are betrayed by his most important people (girlfriend, mother, dauther or wife), the problem is his lack of reaction. I know tha what i called problem it is something that represent netorare but i think it would be more enjoyable and with better stories if the main character react as someone normally do (with anger in most cases, violence or in some greater situation with a master plan for revenge, and i dont say that it has to be a hapy end or that he win in the end but at least that he tried).
